description: Gain +1 Accuracy on the first melee attack you make with a Main Melee weapon on your turn.
Gain +1 Accuracy on the first attack roll you make with an Auxiliary ranged weapon on your turn.
As a protocol, you may steady your aim. If you do, you become Immobilized until the start of your next turn but gain +1 Accuracy on all attacks you make with Rifles.
